attributes.action: Ensure that only material which is directly relevant to the governance of the country be displayed on taxpayer funded government websites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is intended to ensure that all publicly funded government websites only display material which is of direct relevance to government business and that public funds are not wasted on the production or promotion of material, such as "blogs", by persons who are neither elected politicians or civil servants.
